aboutProject.title: About the Project
aboutProject.description: The Alumni Portal is a modern, comprehensive platform designed to bridge the gap between our institution and its distinguished alumni community. This project aims to create a vibrant ecosystem where former students can reconnect, share experiences, and contribute to the growth of current students.

aboutInstitution.title: National Institute of Technology Patna
aboutInstitution.description: Welcome to National Institute of Technology Patna, one of the premier technical institutions in India. Located at Ashok Rajpath, Patna, Bihar, NITP is committed to providing world-class technical education, fostering innovation, and contributing to the nation's technological advancement.
aboutInstitution.history: Founded in 1886 as a survey training school, NIT Patna has evolved through various transformations. It was established as NIT Patna in 2004 under the NIT Act, becoming one of the prestigious National Institutes of Technology. With over a century of legacy, it has grown into a center of technical excellence and innovation.
aboutInstitution.vision: To emerge as a world-class technical institution that produces competent engineers and technologists who contribute significantly to the nation's development and global technological advancement.
aboutInstitution.mission: To provide quality technical education, conduct cutting-edge research, foster innovation and entrepreneurship, and develop technically competent professionals with strong ethical values to meet the challenges of the modern technological world.
